data.title: Web Technology
data.description: Web Technology covers the fundamental concepts of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, and PHP. The main objective of this course is to provide basic knowledge of web design using HTML and CSS, client side scripting using JavaScript, handling web data using XML and server side scripting using PHP.

items.title: Web Technology Old Question Solution 2068 II
Web Technology Old Question Solution 2071 II

content: Web Technology covers the fundamental concepts of HTML, CSS, JavaScript, XML, and PHP. The main objective of this course is to provide basic knowledge of web design using HTML and CSS, client side scripting using JavaScript, handling web data using XML and server side scripting using PHP.
